alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chenango County through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Oxford, or 10 miles southwest of Norwich, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coventry, Oxford, Preston, German, Brisben, Smithville Flats, Mc Donough, South Oxford, Smithville Center and Bowman Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
